t: Road To Infamy Games (R2i Games) | Board Game Publisher | BoardGameGeek
s: Jeffrey Chin and Andrew Nerger started Road To Infamy Games (R2i Games) in their Chicago apartment in October 2014. Their passion for game design stemmed from inventing custom RPGs to entertain their friends. Eventually they decided to try to convert those fun hangout activities into reproducible ...
